attributes.additional_details: Awars Jamie Oliver with a knighthood
attributes.background: Award Jamie Oliver a knighthood for all he has done to improve the health of the nation through healthy eating

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions that ask for someone to be given an honour, or have an honour taken away.

The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
